name: SWARM OF INSECTS
size_type_alignment: Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned
speed: 20 ft., Climb or Fly 20 ft. (DM’s choice)

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: If the swarm has a Climb Speed, the swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) Poison damage, or 3 (1d4 + 1) Poison damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

raw_text:
AC 11 	Initiative +1 (11)
HP 19 (3d8 + 6)
Speed 20 ft., Climb or Fly 20 ft. (DM’s choice)
Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned
